biography: I am a software engineer with experience as a developer, project manager, and researcher. As a developer, I have built full-stack web applications, machine learning models, and e-commerce platforms using tools like Laravel, React.js, TensorFlow, and WordPress. My project management work includes leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-performing websites and resolving complex technical issues to optimize performance and user experience. As a researcher, I have explored federated learning, edge computing, and human activity recognition, drafting IEEE-format papers and presenting innovative frameworks. This blend of skills allows me to bridge technical execution, strategic planning, and innovative problem-solving.
